
hotspot1_1:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/workshop/img_Intelligent Planning_1.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Intelligent Planning</h2><p class="txt">Artificial Intelligence is everywhere - now you can use it to automate your workshop booking and loading processes. You can greatly reduce the time it takes for customers to book their vehicles in, and save as much as 25% working time to perform the same workshop loading tasks.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_01.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">In many cases workshop planning is still performed with manual and paper-based processes. This slows down operations, wastes time, increases cost and firmly places the responsibility on the service team's shoulders to make critical business decisions, but in reality they are setup to fail. Even the best laid plans can change, and if you can't adapt fast you may deliver poor customer experience and see retention rates drop.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_02.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive delivers both rugged hardware and seamless software to create a smarter running workshop and optimized aftersales.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Real-time processing and distribution of technician duties enables you to avoid resource bottlenecks often caused by low-visibility manual planning.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our intelligent workshop planning turbocharges calculations of complex workflows to meet customer need - with AI constantly self-learning the unique demands of your workshop.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Utilizes Open API architecture and is RPA compliant.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Uses AI to plan workorders and assign tasks automatically, planning in a way that ensures handover time to the customer will be met and takes into account technician certification and capability.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our software can adapt instantly in case of sickness to reassign jobs, can take online bookings and planning in teams.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Can work as part of multi or single-point dealerships, constantly generating productivity and efficiency data for management teams.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_03.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Smarter workshops deliver optimized aftersales, it's why we've combined rugged hardware with seamless planning software in a single platform.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Easy and intuitive planning dashboard with visual alerts and full automation for total accuracy.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Customers and service reception staff can book work and allocate technicians in a few clicks for total convenience and speed.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> An adaptable Logic Editor ensures your unique workflows and OEM policies are at the forefront of the planning process and not missed.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Ensure courtesy vehicles, special tools or work-bays are available when you need them</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Dashboard and statistical reporting tracks performance and gives you visibility of your whole operation when you need it.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Seamlessly integrated to OEM, dealership and workshop platforms to speed the processes up and receive information in realtime without the inconvenience of logging in and out of multiple systems.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div hotspot1_2:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/workshop/img_EVHC_1.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">EVHC</h2><p class="txt">Every Industry is digitalizing, from hailing a taxi to accessing healthcare provider information. Automotive is no different, with customer expectation and behavior driving the need for change. Electronic Vehicle Health Checks (EVHC) enable you to provide a paperless and transparent experience for both customers and service reception team - ensuring the handover and walk around inspection process is kept to a minimum for a better customer experience and a heightened opportunity for upselling wear & tear parts.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_06.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Paper-based walk arounds take a long time to perform. Once the customer has signed, the service advisor will have to key the notes back into the DMS. This creates double the work and allows the Service Advisor to skip OEM or Dealer standard processes, potentially leaving the dealership exposed. On top of the extra work and risk of non-compliance, customers also have a worsened experience as they must spend time waiting as the Advisor refers back to the DMS for information.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_07.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive gives workshops the ability to perform easy, integrated and paperless EVHCs.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> 100% Vehicle Inspections – The Getac EVHC platform mandates that all checks are carried out in accordance with OEM standards, delivering customer peace of mind and more revenue opportunities for the dealer.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Quick Intuitive User Interface – Getac's EVHC platform streamlines the whole process, allowing time estimates and accurate handover times to be generated for a quick decisions.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Fits how you work – Our software is operating system agnostic, with a highly configurable and flexible Open API.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> See the full picture – Get a dashboard and management console to interrogate throughput, compliance and efficiency at a site, group, national or global level.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_08.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive's combination of seamless software and rugged hardware come together to deliver a number of workshop benefits:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Move from slow paper processes to a fast, efficient tablet ecosystem.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Control of health check process.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Give your customers more visibility.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Increase parts per repair order and labor hours sold.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Business intelligence shows where improvements can be made.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div class="swiper-wrapper"><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" hotspot1_3:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/workshop/img_EVHC_2.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">EVHC</h2><p class="txt">On average $35 gets added to the average customer retail invoice every time a EVHC is performed on a vehicle. So it's no surprise that vehicle manufacturers and their dealer network will want to perform a multi-point inspection of the vehicle, while the Technician has the vehicle on the ramp and the wheels off. Dialyzing the process ensures no points are missed and customers are kept up to date in realtime. Increasing conversion rates of red and amber identified items by as much as 70%.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_09.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Once the vehicle is on the ramp, the technician should carry out a thorough multi-point inspection every time. This is traditionally done on a paper check-sheet, with any identified items logged and updated to the DMS. Though doing it on paper means the technician can skip the full inspection and only check the items they wish to. It's a time consuming process, without transparency for the customer as there is no image or video capability.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_07.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive gives workshops the ability to perform easy, integrated and paperless EVHCs.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Paperless Workshops – Digitize paper-based checks and allow the technician to capture photos, videos and comments that can be passed on to the customer in a follow up email.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Native Application</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Online / Offline Capabilities</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Roles based</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Embedded Video</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_03.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive's combination of seamless software and rugged hardware come together to deliver a number of workshop benefits:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Move from paper to tablet</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> No double-keying</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Builds trust with a transparent digital experience</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Allow you to deliver on your customer duty of care easily</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> More health checks mean more throughput, safer customers and better retention rates</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div hotspot1_4:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/workshop/img_PC Based Diagnostics.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">PC Based Diagnostics</h2><p class="txt">Did you know there are between 60 and 100 Electronic Control Units on a modern vehicle? Each one requires dedicated diagnostics to conduct a thorough check - and they keep updating. Some happen over the air but others must be done in-person by a diagnostic technician.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_10.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">A comprehensive diagnostic check of a vehicle can take between 1-3 hours and if your workshop deals with products from multiple OEM's, you need a solution that can keep up with both the latest updates and the tough, fast-paced workshop environment.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_11.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive helps you get back time wasted and maximize your technician time with rugged hardware and seamless software.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our tablet PC's connect to the vehicle fast via integrated WLAN or Giga-bit Ethernet.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Getac's PC based diagnostics consider all aspects of the diagnostic process and ensures optimal viewing.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Using rugged, mobile technology allows more time to be spent working on the vehicle without being tied to a workbench.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_12.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac devices are the optimal tool for both dealership workshops and mobile technicians.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Cable Free Connectivity – Our devices connect directly to the vehicle, VCI and workshop computer systems with dual WLAN and Bluetooth.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Rugged as a Service – Subscription models are available - enabling you to spread the investment and take advantage of a strong ROI.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Global Certification and Support – Our devices are certified for global use, supporting major OEM programs and backed by world class service and support.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Optimal Screen Size – Larger screen sizes allow users to easily view datalogging, technical publications, wiring diagrams and job card information.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content hotspot1_5:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/workshop/img_Digital Technical Publications.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Digital Technical Publications</h2><p class="txt">With the average vehicle car parc age getting older - in the US it is circa 11.8 years, Germany 9.8 years and Russia 13 years - upkeep of existing vehicles will require higher maintenance investment. This means access to comprehensive repair and maintenance information from the OEM.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_13.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Right to repair is a hot button topic across a number of industries - including automotive. OEM's are responsible for providing technical parts and service information to its own network, customers and independent repair facilities - either through technical portals and websites for its franchised service points or online subscription services for the independent aftermarket.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_14.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive delivers vehicle code details, non-emission related information, re-programming or flashing for all makes and models, directly to the technician's rugged device - improving vehicle servicing and repair efficiency - to create a seamless technician experience.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_05.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive is the proven workshop and diagnostic tool of choice for OEM's around the world.</p><p class="txt">With Getac's optimized solution you get devices that can:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Become the single platform for repair order tasks, time-clocking, technical data and diagnostics.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Connect with WWAN for OEM cloud-based technical platforms when out in the field or experiencing poor WLAN capabilities.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Confidential technical information secured with Getac optional features such as RFID, Device Monitoring and multi- factor authentication.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Stand up to any workshop task with built-rugged construction and seamless software.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div class="swiper-wrapper"><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="2cVl8tj-hYo" data-title="New Generation UX10 Rugged Tablet"><img src="./../assets/YT_UX10.png"> </a><span class="note">New Generation UX10 Rugged Tablet</span></div></div><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="dgAxqFnfmsQ" data-title="Next Generation F110 Fully Rugged Tablet"><img src="./../assets/YT_F110.png"> </a><span class="note">Next Generation F110 Fully Rugged Tablet</span></div></div></div><div class="swiper-pagination"></div></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Getac Device</h2><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> UX10</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> F110</li></ol><br><br><h2 class="title">Software</h2><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas class="title">Experience Getac Devices with Augmented Reality</h2><p class="txt">Scan the QR code with your smartphone, place the device in your environment. You are ready to play with it!</p><div class="device-ar-code"><a href="../../ar/?device=F110" target="_blank"><img src="./../../images/qrcode_f110.png" alt="F110"></a></div></div></div></div></div></div>
hotspot1_6:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/workshop/img_Intelligent Planning_2.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Intelligent Planning</h2><p class="txt">By digitalizing your job cards and connecting to other workshop systems, such as the DMS, parts and technical, you can gain an extra 10% efficiency and save 12 hours per month for the technician versus paper and manual based workflows.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_04.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Technicians often waste time locating vehicles from the service parking area and this could take as much as 10 minutes per job card. For an average size of workshop (10 Service bays) over the month, this could add up to 146 hours of non-productive time. As well as this, technicians clocking on and off job cards can cause up to 12 hours per month to be wasted accessing centrally located clocking systems.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_02.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive delivers both rugged hardware and seamless software to create a smarter running workshop and optimized aftersales.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Paperless – Digitize paper-based workflows with digital repair orders that have task allocation, time-clocking, internal messenger and direct link to parts and technical information (just in time and real time).</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> With the use of proximity technology and the technicians Getac tablet, the technician will be able to quickly locate the vehicle in a busy forecourt.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_05.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Smarter workshops deliver optimized aftersales, it's why we've combined rugged hardware with seamless planning software in a single platform.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Your Getac tablet is a single, mobile platform for repair order tasks, time-clocking, technical data and diagnostics.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Enhance compliance with better visibility of the real-time, paperless process.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Connects to your workshop through an Open API that is operating system agnostic.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our ‘Just in time’ methodology delivers greater convenience and efficiency.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Mobilize your staff to be productive and take on a greater number of revenue generating jobs with far less idle time.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div (GDMS)</span></div></div></div><div class="swiper-pagination"></div></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Getac Device</h2><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> hotspot2_1:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/manufacturing/img_Shop Floor &amp; Production.png" alt=""></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Shop Floor & Production</h2><p class="txt">The shop floor is a tough environment - with heavy machinery, high levels of vibration and increasingly sophisticated software solutions bringing everything together.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_32.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Aside from environmental factors, the shop floor also serves as the crossroads for a number of other areas including material routing, inventory management, part availability and workforce scheduling.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_22.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac devices are rugged enough to stand up to any environment - including your shop floor. real-time production tracking.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Integration with WMS software for seamless interoperability.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Easy to read screens and ease of use for data capture in extreme environments.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_23.png" hotspot2_2:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/manufacturing/img_Quality Control.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Quality Control</h2><p class="txt">Smooth manufacturing operations rely on efficient machinery and processes. Over 550 Automotive manufacturing plants around the world, representing 60 brands from 14 global companies - all of which are looking to take advantage of Industry 4.0 technology to gain an efficiency edge, reduce costs and enhance customer satisfaction.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_24.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Quality control systems are full of variables - whether it's Six Sigma, TQM or Lean Production – but these variables like failure analysis, acceptance tests, technical inspections, certification and pre-assembly parts inspection can be digitized.</p><p class="txt">To digitize effectively you need a solution that:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Can handle huge amounts of data.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Have built-rugged mobile operations.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Can record past failures, analysis of root cause and suggest corrective action implementation.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Delivers smooth, seamless running across multiple team members in real-time.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_08.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac's rugged mobile hardware and seamless software can become the beating heart of your quality control operation.</p><p class="txt">Our devices are trusted by leading manufacturers to:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Integrate seamlessly with your current ERP software.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Stand up to tough shop floor environments with built-rugged construction.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Capture all inputs from multiple users that are then available on all inter-connected mobile devices.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div hotspot2_3:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/manufacturing/img_Delivery & Transport.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Delivery & Transport</h2><p class="txt">The delivery and transportation of goods is subject to rigorous standards that must be met. Aside from these demands, a paper-based workflow can cause poor visibility across your supply chain.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_26.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Transport and logistics has a unique set of challenges that must be overcome in order to keep customers satisfied, deliveries on track and efficient operations on the road.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Manual paperwork creates blind spots and potential for lost or damaged documents.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Delivery times are becoming tighter, with customers expecting goods in fast shipments.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Fraud and theft continues to be an issue, with disconnected systems creating opportunities for those with bad intentions.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_27.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive's seamlessly connected software solutions are delivered on our famed built-rugged devices, ensuring that there is no task too tough that can't be accomplished.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Increase efficiency, identify opportunities for consolidation and cost reduction with our intelligent software.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Optimize driver route planning.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Get a single platform that connects with your existing systems for ease of operations and device familiarity across your workforce.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Gather data in real-time and have it available across devices for multiple workers and touchpoints.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_28.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Leading industrial manufacturers trust Getac to provide quality devices that blend rugged hardware with optimized software for transport and delivery.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Getac products are inherently rugged and built to survive in all weather conditions.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> We give you comprehensive field engineering support for areas including system integration and compatibility testing, development of docking solutions, software imaging, and aftersales support.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our products are trusted by leading global manufacturers.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> We give you the industry-best warranty for a minimum of three Fully Rugged Tablet</span></div></div><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="W98rgqUcbxA" data-title="Getac Device Monitoring System hotspot2_4:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/manufacturing/img_Shop Floor & Production.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Asset Management & Maintenance</h2><p class="txt">When you own several expensive, complicated assets it's essential to maximize their benefits through a combination of the right hardware and interconnected software to secure the best ROI.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_33.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">The manufacturing environment presents a number of challenges to managers and operators.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Limited connectivity restricts remote access support.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Unstable network connectivity can interrupt asset management and make it difficult to provide the remote support required.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Poor battery performance of devices can cause downtime and loss of productivity.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Harsh environments mean you need specialist, rugged devices.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_23.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac's rugged devices and seamless, easily integrated software connect to how your manufacturing facility works now - finding ways to improve asset management workflows and increase productivity.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Perform predictive maintenance to reduce asset downtime.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Gather real-time data to identify events that may cause issues in the future.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Use built-rugged devices that stand up to the factory environment.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Dual battery capability can last a whole shift and beyond - reducing device downtime.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_25.png" class="mb-3 hotspot4_1:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/warehouse/img_Warehouse.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Inventory & Warehouse Management</h2><p class="txt">The modern manufacturing warehouse is critical in ensuring operational efficiency in the manufacturing process - from managing movement of component parts from incoming goods to outgoing end product.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_30.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Many warehouses use a Warehouse Management System (WMS) to control their inventory levels, and many are moving towards automation to achieve efficiency and cost-reduction - but you need devices that can match their sophistication.</p><p class="txt">Modern warehouse devices must be able to:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Capture, record and manage inventory flow.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Perform order processing, picking/packing tasks and capture loading and unloading.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Automate material handling where humans and robots are required to work</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Integrate with Automated Storage and Retrieval Systems, Automated Guided Vehicles.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Work with barcodes or RFID readers.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Go mobile with workers for truly integrated operations.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Stand up to tough factory floor tasks and environments.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_29.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac's solution for inventory and warehouse management integrates seamlessly with the leading inventory management, ERP and WMS software. Our rugged devices have both the computing power and tough construction required for you to work at ease, providing the ideal platform for inventory and warehouse management.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_31.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Our built-rugged solutions stand up to the test of the tough warehouse environment, providing a range of functionalities that can help you track and manage inventory.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our multiple rugged tablets can be operated one-handed with the optional digitizer pen.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Built-in cameras render verbal descriptions redundant, making it easier to preserve and transfer data.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our devices offer 1D and 2D barcode reader options to help your warehouse operations run smoothly.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> With a range of mounts, docks and other accessories our devices are completely configurable - whether that's mounted on a forklift or with hands-free carrying options.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" hotspot3_1:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/rd/img_Validation & Testing.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Validation & Testing</h2><p class="txt">Today's vehicles are becoming more sophisticated, with onboard computers, electrical power and complex architecture. Every aspect of a vehicle must be thoroughly tested and validated before production - meaning engineers need devices that can work in tandem with complex systems.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_15.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Testing doesn't just put a demand on the vehicles - it can also put strain on the devices used to perform checks, scanning and calibration. From extreme weather testing to the bumps, knocks and drops in the test lab, devices must be able to support engineers with smooth, precise software that can interface with complicated instruments and stand up to the rugged environment.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_16.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac's rugged devices are perfectly suited to the test lab and have been used to support multiple projects in R&D.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Extreme Weather Ready – Getac devices are certified to perform in rain, dust, shock, vibration and withstand both extreme high and low temperatures.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Specialized Ports – Our devices are equipped with ports that support a wide range of calibration, measurement and industry specific tools.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Secure – Protect your sensitive data with biometric security and complete control of your devices.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Versatile – Rugged hardware works in conjunction with manufacturer engineering software to perform scanning, cataloguing and ECU programming uninterrupted.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_17.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">The test lab is a critical part of a vehicle's journey from concept to production. It's a place you need rugged devices you can put your full trust in, that's why we've built our range of devices to perform in R&D.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Cable-Free Connectivity – Connect directly to the vehicle, VCI and R&D infrastructure via fast dual WLAN and Bluetooth.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Global Certification and Support – Our devices are in use by major OEMs, are certified for use globally and backed by our world-class support and services.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Optimized Screen Sizes – No matter your needs, our wide range of devices have large screen sizes to support tasks such as Test Data, Thermal Battery Testing and 3D prototyping.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Flexible Connectivity – Our configurable port options work with the industry's leading testing and measurement devices.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row hotspot3_2:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"><div class="tab-content show tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="intro-img"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/rd/img_Extreme Conditions.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Extreme Conditions & Environmental Testing</h2><p class="txt">Modern vehicles have to stand up to extreme conditions - whether that's the rigours of a frozen road or a hot, humid sub-continental environment. To thoroughly test these conditions, you need a device that can stand up to the same challenges.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_18.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Not all devices are able to survive in harsh conditions - whether they're simply not built-rugged from the start or have to be put in a case to prevent damage. High-humidity, low temperatures, searing heat - each has its challenges, not to mention risk of drops, knocks or damage in the laboratory.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_19.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac is the device of choice for several OEM's to take out into the field, connect with measurement devices and perform as a data acquisition device. They are designed to work in harsh and extreme ambient temperatures, endure high levels of vibration - ensuring there is no costly disruption, device replacement or a need to repeat the test.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="../assets/modal_detail/img_20.png" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Our compact, rugged-devices have a number of features that make them perfectly suited to any environment:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Built-rugged construction permeates every level of our devices.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Fast, powerful processors enable rapid working and calculation for the most precise data.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> High ease-of-use and device familiarity ensures seamlessly operability by all members of your team.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> A range of configurations and accessories means our devices can be modulated to suit any task or environment.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div class="swiper-wrapper"><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="2cVl8tj-hYo" data-title="New Generation UX10 Rugged Tablet"><img src="./../assets/YT_UX10.png"> </a><span class="note">New Generation UX10 Rugged Tablet</span></div></div><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="dgAxqFnfmsQ" data-title="Next Generation F110 Fully Rugged Tablet"><img
